context_for_next_testing_agent: Phase 8 adds: (1) TaskScheduler with CRUD operations at tasks.* RPC methods, (2) NotificationManager at notifications.* RPC methods with real-time WebSocket push via notification.new events, (3) monitor_url tool that takes screenshots and uses GPT-4o vision to detect changes. Frontend has TasksPanel on dashboard with New Task form (name, prompt, interval, agent, notify), task action buttons (run now, pause/resume, history, delete), and NotificationsPanel. ChatPage has a bell icon with dropdown. All Phase 8 features are fully working.

tasks_rpc.tasks.create: Creates scheduled task with name, prompt, interval_seconds, agent_id, notify mode
tasks_rpc.tasks.list: Lists all scheduled tasks with count
tasks_rpc.tasks.delete: Deletes a task and its history
tasks_rpc.tasks.history: Returns execution history with timestamps, responses, tool counts

notifications_rpc.notifications.list: Lists notifications with unread_count, supports unread_only filter
notifications_rpc.notifications.mark_read: Marks single notification (with id) or all notifications (without id) as read

monitor_tool.name: monitor_url
monitor_tool.description: Takes screenshot of URL and analyzes with GPT-4o vision, tracks state changes

frontend_components.TasksPanel: Dashboard component with task list, New Task button, action buttons
frontend_components.NotificationsPanel: Dashboard component showing notifications with mark read/clear options
frontend_components.ChatPage bell: Header notification icon with dropdown showing recent notifications
